data.name: My Furry Detective üêæ
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist our new game My Furry Dragon:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1818370/My_Furry_Dragon/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1928840/My_Dragon_Party/

Not everyone can be a detective, it requiers a lot of practical skills and logical thinking. Some people, however, try to achieve their dreams despite common sense. Your new partner, Eva, is just this type of person - no skills, but full of motivation to become the best detective in this city. Nobody could be her partner for more than a month, everybody in agency makes bets on how long you may stay with her.

My Furry Detective is a comedy detective story about motivation, hard work and dreams. Investigate the crime, spend time with your partner, and who knows, maybe you can get along, or even solve the crime together?

Features:

‚Ä¢ Fascinating story with romance and comedy elements.
‚Ä¢ HD fully original artworks.
‚Ä¢ 2 hours of content.
‚Ä¢ Relaxing atmosphere.
‚Ä¢ Hot detective!

data.short_description: A mysterious crime that nobody could investigate is now on your shoulders. Not only yours, actually, there is also a detective that everybody in agency makes jokes about, she is your partner now. Who knows, maybe she is a good detective?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: anything from this millenium
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Sound Card: potato

content_descriptors.notes: This visual novel contains partial nudity, mentions of alcohol consumption, sexual themes and dialogue.
